# imageName

**Instance Property**

The name of the image to load from the Watch app’s bundle.

## Declaration

```swift
var imageName: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value in this property is set using the [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKImage/init(imageName:)] method. For image objects created using other methods, this property is `nil`.

## Getting the Image Data

- **image**: The UIKit image object
- **imageData**: The data object containing the raw image data.

items.description: The data object containing the raw image data.
